title: misc/notepadplus: Notepad++ styling, extra argument for character
body:
by **gvdschoot**: 
Notepad++ 

The userdefinedlang.xml file doesn't have delimiters for chars, ''. This results in bad
formatting.

I also changed the color of comment (/* .. */ and //) from gray to green, which is
better visible and is the same color as C / C++ color style.
And the color of values is according the C / C++ style.

Notepad++ has a new format for userdefinedlang. This is marked with:
udlVersion="2.1"
Only with this version the changes can work.
